card.name: ·Bound By Rage
card.text: Plays to your support area. When you play this condition, you may spot 2 {Dunland} Men to place 2 {Dunland} tokens here. Response: If a {Dunland} Man is about to take a wound, discard this condition or remove a {Dunland} token from here to prevent that wound.

card.name: Dunlending Elder
card.text: While you control 2 sites, this minion is strength +5, fierce and damage +1.

card.name: Dunlending Footmen
card.text: The twilight cost of this minion during a skirmish phase is -2.

card.name: Dunlending Headman
card.text: When you play this minion, you may spot 2 other {Dunland} Men to take control of a site. The Free Peoples player may discard 2 cards from hand to prevent this.

card.name: Dunlending Reserve
card.text: The twilight cost of this minion during a skirmish phase is -2.

card.name: Hill Clan
card.text: Each time this minion wins a skirmish, you may play a {Dunland} Man from hand. That Man is fierce and damage +2 until the regroup phase.

card.name: Ready to Fall
card.text: Plays to your support area. Shadow: Spot 2 sites you control and remove {2} to play a {Dunland} Man from your discard pile.

card.name: Too Long Have These Peasants Stood
card.text: Response: If a {Dunland} Man wins a skirmish, discard all conditions.

card.name: Lend Us Your Aid
card.text: Maneuver: Exert Gilmi twice to make him and each Elf companion strength +3 until the regroup phase.

card.name: ·Suspended Palaces
card.text: Plays to your support area. When you play this condition, you may spot a Dwarf to place 2 {Dwarven} tokens here. Fellowship: Discard this condition or remove a {Dwarven} token from here to stack the top card of your draw deck on a {Dwarven} condition that has a card stacked on it.

card.name: Toss Me
card.text: While this card is stacked on a {Dwarven} condition, Gimli is strength +1. Fellowship: Place this card or another {Dwarven} card from hand on top of or beneath your draw deck.

card.name: ·Agility
card.text: Plays to your support area. When you play this condition, you may spot an Elf to place 2 {Elven} tokens here. Skirmish: Discard this condition or remove an {Elven} token from here to make a minion skirmishing an Elf strength -1.

card.name: ·Arwen, Evenstar of Her People
card.text: Skirmish: Exert an Elf to make a minion skirmishing Arwen strength -1.

card.name: Banner of Elbereth
card.text: Bearer must be an Elf companion. Each time bearer wins a skirmish, you may draw a card. Response: If bearer wins a skirmish, discard this possession to liberate a site.

card.name: ·Elrond, Keeper of Vilya
card.text: At the start of each turn, heal Elrond. Fellowship: Exert Elrond to discard the top card of your draw deck. If it is an {Elven} card, you may take it into hand and heal an Elf companion.

card.name: Forearmed
card.text: Skirmish: Reveal the top card of your draw deck to make a minion skirmishing an Elf strength -X, where X is the twilight cost of the revealed card.

card.name: Forewarned
card.text: To play, spot 2 Elves. Plays to your support area. Fellowship: Add {1} to look at the top card of your draw deck. You may discard this condition to discard that card.

card.name: ·Galadriel, Keeper of Nenya
card.text: At the start of each turn, heal Galadriel. Skirmish: Exert Galadriel to discard the top card of your draw deck. If it is a Shadow card, make a minion skirmishing an Elf strength -3.

card.name: Gift of Foresight
card.text: Fellowship: Spot an Elf to reveal the top card of your draw deck. You may discard it, return it to the top of your draw deck, or take it into hand.

card.name: Must Be a Dream
card.text: Fellowship: Spot an Elf to reveal the top card of your draw deck. Heal up to 2 companions whose culture matches the revealed card. You may discard the revealed card.

card.name: Naith Longbow
card.text: Bearer must be an Elf companion. Archery: Exert bearer to discard the top card of your draw deck. If it is an {Elven} card, exert a minion.

card.name: ·Naith Troop
card.text: To play, spot 3 Elf companions. Skirmish: Exert Naith Troop to discard the top card of your draw deck. If it is an {Elven} card, make a minion skirmishing Naith Troop strength -2.

card.name: ·Naith Warband
card.text: To play, spot 3 Elf companions. While Naith Warband bears a ranged weapon, it takes no more than 1 wound during each skirmish phase and does not add to the fellowship archery total.

card.name: Boomed and Trumpeted
card.text: Skirmish: Make an Ent strength +X and damage +X, where X is the number of unbound Hobbits you can spot.

card.name: Crack Into Rubble
card.text: Regroup: Exert 2 Ents to liberate a site and discard a Shadow condition.

card.name: Enraged
card.text: Bearer must be an Ent. Limit 1 per bearer. Discard this condition at the end of the turn.

card.name: Ent Avenger
card.text: While you can spot 3 Ents, this companion is strength +2.

card.name: ·Ent Horde
card.text: To play, spot 2 Ent companions. Ent Horde's twilight code is -2 for each Ent or unbound Hobbit you can spot. While you can spot more minions than companions, Ent Horde is defender +1.

card.name: Ent Moot
card.text: To play, exert an unbound Hobbit. Bearer must be an Ent. Limit 1 per bearer.

card.name: ·Gandalf, Mithrandir
card.text: Damage +1. Each time the fellowship moves, wound Gandalf.

card.name: ·Glamdring, Lightning Brand
card.text: Bearer must be Gandalf. He is damage +1. Each time you play a spell during a skirmish, you may make Gandalf damage +1 until the end of that skirmish.

card.name: ·Host of Fangorn
card.text: To play, spot 2 Ent companions. Host of Fangorn's twilight cost is -2 for each Ent or unbound Hobbit you can spot.

card.name: ·Quickbeam, Bregalad
card.text: Quickbeam's twilight cost is -1 for each Ent or unbound Hobbit you can spot.

card.name: Roused
card.text: Skirmish: Exert an Ent to make him strength +1 for each Ent you spot (limit +4).

card.name: ·Skinbark, Fladrif
card.text: Skinbark's twilight cost is -1 for each Ent or unbound Hobbit you can spot. Response: If an unbound Hobbit is about to take a wound, exert Skinbark to prevent that wound.

card.name: Threw Down My Enemy
card.text: Spell. Skirmish: Make a minion skirmishing Gandalf strength -1 for each wound on each character in the skirmish.

card.name: ·Treebeard, Guardian of the Forest
card.text: Unhasty. Assignment: Exert an unbound Hobbit to allow Treebeard to skirmish. Skirmish: Exert Treebeard to make an Ent damage +1.

card.name: Don't Follow the Lights
card.text: Response: If Sméagol wins a skirmish, add a burden to discard a minion.

card.name: Don't Look at Them
card.text: Plays to your support area. Skirmish: Discard 3 cards from hand to wound a minion Sméagol is skirmishing once (or twice if that minion is a {Ringwraith} minion).

card.name: ·Gollum, Old Villain
card.text: Skirmish: Discard a card from hand to make Gollum strength +1 (or +2 if skirmishing a Ring-bound companion).

card.name: Master Broke His Promise
card.text: Regroup: Exert Gollum 3 times to wound each companion. The move limit for this turn is -1.

card.name: Nasty, Foul Hobbitses
card.text: Response: If Gollum wins a skirmish, add a burden.

card.name: Not Listening
card.text: Response: If Sméagol wins a skirmish, heal him and remove 2 burdens.

card.name: Safe Paths
card.text: Regroup: Exert Sméagol 3 times and discard him to would each minion. The move limit for this turn is +1. If the fellowship moves, each Shadow player may take up to 3 Shadow cards into hand from his or her discard pile.

card.name: ·Sméagol, Poor Creature
card.text: Ring-bound. To play, add a burden. Skirmish: Discard a card from hand to make Sméagol strength +1.

card.name: They Stole It
card.text: Plays to your support area. Skirmish: Discard 3 cards from hand to wound a companion Gollum is skirmishing once (or twice if that companion is a {Shire} companion).

card.name: You're a Liar and a Thief
card.text: Response: If Gollum wins a skirmish, wound a companion (except the Ring-bearer).

card.name: ·Anborn, Skilled Huntsman
card.text: Ring-bound. Ranger. Each time Anborn wins a skirmish, you may make a minion's site number +3 until the regroup phase.

card.name: Ancient Roads
card.text: Plays to your support area. While you can spot 3 rangers, the site number of each minion skirmishing a ranger is +2.

card.name: ·Aragorn, Defender of Free Peoples
card.text: Skirmish: Remove an {Elven} token to make a minion skirmishing Aragorn strength -3. Skirmish: Remove a {Dwarven} token to heal a Dwarf. Regroup: If Aragorn is mounted, remove a {Rohan} token to wound a minion twice.

card.name: Banner of Westernesse
card.text: Bearer must be a {Gondor} companion. Each time bearer wins a skirmish, you may heal another {Gondor} companion. Response: If bearer wins a skirmish, discard this possession to liberate a site.

card.name: ·Garrison or Osgiliath
card.text: Fortification. Plays to your support area. When you play this condition, you may spot a {Gondor} Man to place 2 {Gondor} tokens here. Skirmish: Discard this condition or remove a {Gondor} token from here to make a {Gondor} Man strength +1.

card.name: Mortal Men
card.text: Skirmish: Make a {Gondor} Man strength +2 (and exert a minion if you spot a {Rohan} token).

card.name: Perilous Ventures
card.text: Regroup: Exert two rangers to discard a minion (or two {Ringwraith} minions).

card.name: ·Ring of Barahir
card.text: Bearer must be Aragorn. At the start of each of your turns, you may spot a culture token to heal a companion of that culture.

card.name: Trust
card.text: Skirmish: Make a {Gonder} Man strength +2 (and heal a companion if you spot an {Elven} token).

card.name: Agents of Orthanc
card.text: This minion is strength +2 and damage +1 for each Free Peoples culture that you can spot over 2.

card.name: Assault Ladder
card.text: Machine. Plays to your support area. Shadow: Exert an Uruk-hai to place an {Isengard} token on this card. Skirmish: Spot 3 {Isengard} tokens here to make an Uruk-hai strength +3. Discard this condition.

card.name: Banner of Isengard
card.text: Bearer must be an {Isengard} minion. Each time bearer wins a skirmish, the Free Peoples player must exert a companion for each site you control.

card.name: ·Berserk Butcher
card.text: Damage +1. Berserk Butcher is strength +1 for each wound on each character in its skirmish. Maneuver: Remove an {Isengard} token from a machine and exert Berserk Butcher twice to prevent all wounds to Uruk-hai until the assignment phase.

card.name: Desertion
card.text: To play, spot an {Isengard} Man. Plays on a companion (except the Ring-bearer). Assignment: Assign an {Isengard} minion with less strength than bearer to skirmish bearer. Discard this condition.

card.name: Fires and Foul Fumes
card.text: Regroup: Discard 4 {Isengard} Orcs to wound a companion 4 times (except the Ring-bearer).

card.name: Gnawing, Biting, Hacking, Burning
card.text: Plays to your support area. Each time a regroup action discards an {Isengard} Orc, you may stack that Orc on this card. Shadow: Discard 2 cards stacked here and remove {1} to play an {Isengard} Orc from your discard pile.

card.name: Iron Fist of the Orc
card.text: Plays to your support area. Each time a regroup action discards an {Isengard} Orc, you may stack that Orc on this card. Regroup: Discard 3 cards stacked here and remove {1} to discard a Free Peoples possession.

card.name: Isengard Artisan
card.text: Regroup: Discard an {Isengard} Orc to make the Free Peoples player would a companion.

card.name: Isengard Builder
card.text: Regroup: If stacked on an {Isengard} card, discard this card to add {2}.

card.name: Isengard Journeyman
card.text: Regroup: Discard an {Isengard} Orc to make the Free Peoples player wound a companion.

card.name: Isengard Mechanics
card.text: Regroup: Discard an {Isengard} Orc to make the Free Peoples player wound a companion (or 2 companions if you spot 6 companions). Regroup: If this minion is stacked on an {Isengard} card, spot an {Isengard} Orc and discard this minion to add {3}.

card.name: Isengard Plodder
card.text: Regroup: Discard an {Isengard} Orc to make the Free Peoples player wound a companion.

card.name: Isengard Tender
card.text: Regroup: If stacked on an {Isengard} card, discard this card and remove {2} to exhaust a companion.

card.name: Isengard Tinker
card.text: Regroup: Discard an {Isengard} Orc to make the Free Peoples player wound a companion.

card.name: Rohirrim Traitor
card.text: While you can spot a companion bearing an {Isengard} condition, this minion is strength +2.

card.name: Scaffolding
card.text: Plays to your support area. Each time a regroup action discards an {Isengard} Orc, you may stack that Orc on this card. Response: If an {Isengard} Orc is about to take a wound, discard 2 cards stacked here to prevent that wound.

card.name: ·Sharku, Vile Marauder
card.text: Warg-rider. While Sharku is not exhausted, he is fierce. Regroup: Exert Sharku to add {1}.

card.name: Twisted Tales
card.text: Plays to your support area. Each time a companion or ally loses a skirmish involving an {Isengard} Man, you may spot a possession to stack that possession here.

card.name: ·The Balrog, Terror of Flame and Shadow
card.text: Damage +2. This twilight cost of The Balrog is -3 if you can spot a {Moria} minion. The Balrog cannot be assigned to skirmish companions or allies of strength less than 6.

card.name: ·Durin's Tower
card.text: Plays to your support area. At sites 2{T} and 3{T}, The Balrog's twilight cost is -3. Skirmish: Discard this condition to make a unique {Moria} minion strength +3.

card.name: Easterling Army
card.text: Easterling. Fierce. Skirmish: Spot 2 burdens and exert this minion to make an Easterling strength +1. Skirmish: Spot 4 burdens and exert this minion to make an Easterling strength +2. Skirmish: Spot 6 burdens and exert this minion to make an Easterling strength +3.

card.name: Easterling Polearm
card.text: Bearer must be an Easterling. While you can spot 2 burdens, bearer cannot take wounds. While you can spot 5 burdens, bearer is damage +1.

card.name: Southron Archer Legion
card.text: Southron. Archer. Archery: Remove {3} to add 1 to the minion archery total for each companion over 4 (limit +4).

card.name: Southron Invaders
card.text: Southron. Ambush {1}. When you play this minion, you may spot another Southron to play a minion with ambush from your discard pile.

card.name: Trample
card.text: Maneuver: Spot a mounted {Raider} Man to discard a companion (except the Ring-bearer). The Free Peoples player may add {4} to prevent this.

card.name: Fell Beast
card.text: To play, discard 2 cards from hand. Bearer must be a Nazgûl. Bearer is fierce.

card.name: Spied From Above
card.text: Plays to your support area. Regroup: Exert a Nazgûl twice to play a {Ringwraith} or {Sauron} minion. That minion's twilight cost is -8 and it comes into play exhausted.

card.name: ·Sword of Dol Guldur
card.text: Bearer must be a Nazgûl. While bearer is Úlairë Toldëa, each time he wins a skirmish the Free Peoples player must discard a Free Peoples possession or a Free Peoples condition.

card.name: ·Úlairë Lemenya, Winged Hunter
card.text: Regroup: Exert Úlairë Lemenya and discard 3 cards from hand to return a companion (except the Ring-bearer) to owner's hand.

card.name: ·Úlairë Nertëa, Winged Hunter
card.text: When you play Úlairë Nertëa, spot another Nazgûl to make the Free Peoples player exert a Ring-bound companion for each Free Peoples culture you can spot over 2.

card.name: ·Úlairë Toldëa, Winged Sentry
card.text: Fierce. Each time Úlairë Toldëa wins a skirmish, the Free Peoples player must exert a companion or add a burden.

card.name: Winged and Ominous
card.text: Plays to your support area. Regroup: Exert a Nazgûl to place a {Ringwraith} token on this card. Shadow: Remove 3 {Ringwraith} tokens from here to add {2}.

card.name: Banner of the Mark
card.text: Bearer must be a {Rohan} companion. Each time bearer wins a skirmish, you may exert a minion. Response: If bearer wins a skirmish, discard this possession to liberate a site.

card.name: Blood Has Been Spilled
card.text: Plays to your support area. Skirmish: Discard a mount borne by a {Rohan} Man to prevent that Man from being overwhelmed unless his or her strength is tripled.

card.name: ·Éomer, Rohirrim Captain
card.text: Valiant. While you can spot a {Rohan} Man, Éomer's twilight cost is -1. Skirmish: Discard 3 cards from hand to make a {Rohan} Man strength +2 for each wound on each minion in his or her skirmish.

card.name: Ever the Hope of Men
card.text: Regroup: Exert 2 mounted {Rohan} Men to discard up to 2 wounded minions.

card.name: ·Háma, Doorward of Théoden
card.text: To play, spot a {Rohan} Man. Skirmish: Exert Háma to discard a possession borne by a minion he is skirmishing.

card.name: ·Hrethel, Rider of Rohan
card.text: To play, spot a {Rohan} Man. Skirmish: Heal a minion skirmishing Hrethel to make Hrethel strength +3 (limit +3).

card.name: News From the Mark
card.text: Fellowship: Spot 3 mounted {Rohan} Men to make the move limit for this turn +2. Each Shadow player may draw 6 cards.

card.name: ·We Left None Alive
card.text: Plays to your support area. When you play this condition, you may spot a {Rohan} Man to place 2 {Rohan} tokens here. Skirmish: Discard this condition or remove a {Rohan} token from here to make a {Rohan} Man skirmishing an exhausted minion strength +2.

card.name: Banner of the Eye
card.text: Bearer must be an {Sauron} Orc. Each time bearer wins a skirmish, you may add {1} for each site you control.

card.name: Corpse Lights
card.text: Twilight. Skirmish: Exert this minion to make a {Sauron} or twilight minion strength +1 for each twilight minion you can spot.

card.name: Dead Ones
card.text: Twilight. Damage +1. To play this minion, remove a burden or spot a twilight minion.

card.name: ·Gate Picket
card.text: Maneuver: Exert this minion twice to make the Free Peoples player name 3 cultures. Wound each companion and ally not of a named culture.

card.name: Gate Sentry
card.text: Maneuver: Exert this minion twice and spot another {Sauron} minion to discard a condition.

card.name: ·Gate Troll
card.text: Fierce. While you can spot a Troll, Gate Troll's twilight cost is -4. For each other {Sauron} minion you can spot, this minion is strength +1.

card.name: ·Orc Insurgent
card.text: Shadow: Exert this minion to draw X cards and add {X}, where X is the number of Free Peoples cultures you spot over 2.

card.name: Peril
card.text: Plays to your support area. Regroup: Exert a {Sauron} Orc to play a Nazgûl or {Sauron} minion. Its twilight cost is -4 and it comes into play exhausted.

card.name: Troll of Udûn
card.text: Fierce. While you can spot a Troll, this minion's twilight cost is -4. Skirmish: Discard a {Sauron} card from hand to make this minion strength +1.

card.name: Troll's Chain
card.text: Bearer must be a {Sauron} Troll. When you play this possession, you may draw a card.

card.name: Wisp of Pale Sheen
card.text: Twilight. Regroup: Spot another {Sauron} or twilight minion and discard this minion to add a burden.

card.name: Held
card.text: Bearer must be Frodo. Each time Frodo is about to be killed by a wound, add a burden instead. When the fellowship moves to site 9, Frodo is corrupted. Regroup: If you can spot no minions, discard this condition.

card.name: It Burns Us
card.text: Regroup: Spot Sam and Sméagol (or Gollum) to choose an opponent who must reveal his or her hand. Wound a minion X times, where X is the number of different cultures revealed.

card.name: ·Kept Safe
card.text: Plays to your support area. When you play this condition, place 2 {Shire} tokens here. Response: If an unbound Hobbit is about to take a wound, discard this condition or remove a {Shire} token from here to prevent that wound.

card.name: Long Slow Wrath
card.text: Skirmish: Exert an unbound Hobbit to make him strength +1 and damage +1 for each {Gandalf} companion you can spot.

card.name: ·Merry, Impatient Hobbit
card.text: Regroup: Discard Merry to heal a {Gandalf} companion.

card.name: ·Pippin, Hastiest of All
card.text: Regroup: Discard Pippin to choose a Shadow player who much wound one of his or her minions.

card.name: Rocks of Emyn Muil
card.text: Fellowship: Play a companion with the Frodo signet to remove a burden.

card.name: Westfold
card.text: Fellowship: Exert Aragorn twice to play a companion with the Aragorn signet from your draw deck.

card.name: Meduseld
card.text: Sanctuary. Fellowship: Exert 3 companions with the Gandalf signet to play an unbound companion from your dead pile.

card.name: Hornburg Hall
card.text: Sanctuary. Fellowship: Spot 3 companions with the Théoden signet and discard your hand to draw 4 cards.

card.name: Valley of Saruman
card.text: When the fellowship moves to this site, discard all allies.

card.name: Saruman's Laboratory
card.text: Response: If your minion is about to take a wound, discard 2 cards from hand to prevent that wound.

card.name: ·Faramir, Ithilien Ranger
card.text: Ring-bound. Ranger. If Faramir is in your starting fellowship, his twilight cost is -1. Fellowship: Play a ranger to heal a Ring-bound companion.

card.name: ·The Witch-king, Deathless Lord
card.text: Fierce. Each time a companion is killed in a skirmish involving a Nazgûl, wound an ally twice or exert a companion.

card.name: Enraged
card.text: Bearer must be an Ent. Limit 1 per bearer. Discard this condition at the end of the turn.

card.name: ·Skinbark, Fladrif
card.text: Skinbark's twilight cost is -1 for each Ent or unbound Hobbit you can spot. Response: If an unbound Hobbit is about to take a wound, exert Skinbark to prevent that wound.

card.name: Don't Look at Them
card.text: Plays to your support area. Skirmish: DIscard 3 cards from hand to wound a minion Sméagol is skirmishing once (or twice if that minion is a {Ringwraith} minion).

card.name: Ancient Roads
card.text: Plays to your support area. While you can spot 3 rangers, the site number of each minion skirmishing a ranger is +2.

card.name: Isengard Mechanics
card.text: Regroup: Discard an {Isengard} Orc to make the Free Peoples player wound a companion (or 2 companions if you spot 6 companions). Regroup: If this minion is stacked on an {Isengard} card, spot an {Isengard} Orc and discard this minion to add {3}.

card.name: ·Gate Troll
card.text: Fierce. While you can spot a Troll, Gate Troll's twilight cost is -4. For each other {Sauron} minion you can spot, this minion is strength +1.
